statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE influencer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, influencer_name, engagement_score FROM social_media_engagement_metrics ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT id, post_likes, post_comments FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score > 50;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics ORDER BY post_likes DESC, post_comments ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, SUM(post_likes) AS total_likes FROM social_media_engagement_metrics GROUP BY influencer_name;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score > 100 ORDER BY post_likes DESC, post_comments DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT influencer_name, SUM(post_likes) AS total_likes FROM social_media_engagement_metrics GROUP BY influencer_name HAVING total_likes > 500 ORDER BY total_likes DESC
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_score, (post_likes + post_comments) AS total_interactions FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score < 50 ORDER BY total_interactions ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT influencer_name, post_likes, post_comments, engagement_score FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE post_likes > 500 AND post_comments > 100 ORDER BY influencer_name ASC
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE influencer_name LIKE '%John%' OR influencer_name LIKE '%Jane%' ORDER BY engagement_score DESC, post_likes DESC
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM social_media_engagement_metrics ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT id, influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_rate > 5;
SELECT * FROM influencer_partnerships WHERE partnership_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND partnership_end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT influencer_name, partnership_start_date, partnership_end_date FROM influencer_partnerships ORDER BY partnership_start_date;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE follower_count > 10000 ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics JOIN influencer_partnerships ON social_media_engagement_metrics.influencer_name = influencer_partnerships.influencer_name;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_rate > 5.0 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT MAX(follower_count) AS max_followers, MIN(follower_count) AS min_followers FROM social_media_engagement_metrics;
SELECT influencer_name, partnership_start_date, partnership_end_date FROM influencer_partnerships WHERE partnership_end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY partnership_end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY likes DESC
SELECT id, post_text FROM posts WHERE influencer_id = 1 ORDER BY post_date DESC
SELECT post_id, SUM(likes) AS total_likes FROM social_media_engagement_metrics GROUP BY post_id ORDER BY total_likes DESC
SELECT name, followers, engagement_rate FROM influencers WHERE followers > 50000 AND engagement_rate > 0.1
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY shares DESC, comments ASC
SELECT influencers.name, influencers.followers, posts.post_text FROM influencers INNER JOIN posts ON influencers.id = posts.influencer_id WHERE posts.post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'

SELECT posts.id, posts.post_text, social_media_engagement_metrics.likes AS total_likes FROM posts LEFT JOIN social_media_engagement_metrics ON posts.id = social_media_engagement_metrics.post_id WHERE social_media_engagement_metrics.shares > 50

SELECT influencers.name AS influencer_name, SUM(social_media_engagement_metrics.likes) AS total_likes FROM influencers INNER JOIN social_media_engagement_metrics ON influencers.id = social_media_engagement_metrics.influencer_id GROUP BY influencers.name HAVING total_likes > 500

SELECT posts.post_text, influencers.name AS influencer_name, social_media_engagement_metrics.comments AS total_comments FROM posts INNER JOIN influencers ON posts.influencer_id = influencers.id LEFT JOIN social_media_engagement_metrics ON posts.id = social_media_engagement_metrics.post_id WHERE social_media_engagement_metrics.comments < 10 ORDER BY posts.post_date ASC
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT name, followers_count FROM influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT post_content, likes, comments FROM posts WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY comments ASC;
SELECT * FROM engagements WHERE engagement_type = 'like' AND engagement_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT influencer_id, count(post_id) as total_posts FROM posts GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING total_posts > 5;
SELECT * FROM influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC, engagement_rate ASC;

SELECT influencers.name, posts.post_content, engagements.engagement_type FROM influencers JOIN posts ON influencers.id = posts.influencer_id JOIN engagements ON posts.post_id = engagements.post_id WHERE influencers.name = 'ExampleName';

SELECT influencers.name, SUM(engagements.likes) AS total_likes, SUM(engagements.comments) AS total_comments FROM influencers JOIN posts ON influencers.id = posts.influencer_id JOIN engagements ON posts.post_id = engagements.post_id GROUP BY influencers.name;

SELECT influencers.name, AVG(analytics.reach) AS avg_reach, AVG(analytics.impressions) AS avg_impressions, AVG(analytics.clicks) AS avg_clicks FROM influencers JOIN posts ON influencers.id = posts.influencer_id JOIN analytics ON posts.post_id = analytics.post_id GROUP BY influencers.name;

SELECT influencers.name, engagements.engagement_type, engagements.engagement_time FROM influencers JOIN posts ON influencers.id = posts.influencer_id JOIN engagements ON posts.post_id = engagements.post_id WHERE engagements.engagement_time >= TIMESTAMP '2022-01-01' AND engagements.engagement_time <= TIMESTAMP '2022-12-31';
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM posts
SELECT user_id, comment_text FROM comments
SELECT engagement_type, engagement_date FROM engagements
SELECT * FROM likes
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 1000;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM influencers JOIN posts ON influencers.influencer_id = posts.influencer_id GROUP BY influencer_name;
SELECT post_content, COUNT(*) AS total_likes FROM posts JOIN likes ON posts.post_id = likes.post_id GROUP BY post_content ORDER BY total_likes DESC;

SELECT influencer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_engagements FROM influencers JOIN posts ON influencers.influencer_id = posts.influencer_id JOIN engagements ON posts.post_id = engagements.post_id GROUP BY influencer_name ORDER BY total_engagements DESC;
